item.description:
It's time to move toward self-sufficiency, which includes the capablility to grow your own food. 

Even if you live in a large city as an apartment dweller, this is possible by using Tower Gardens.  They also make great "conversation pieces" and are extremely practical.

Come see a 6 ft tall Tower Garden in operation, at residence of Aalia Kusmis, your group organizer.  She lives upstairs from the ULCS Clinic, where members have met previously in the downstairs classroom. 

This time the meetup will be conducted in her 40 ft long solarium, where you will also be able to view some of her additional hydroponic projects as well.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

         Convenient, Affordable, & Efficient

Grow your own food outside or inside year-round!

 No growing experience necessary!

There is no weeding, tilling, kneeling, or getting dirty! The Tower Garden™ is a plug and play vertical garden.

There is no need to have a “green thumb.” The Tower Garden™ Pro Series comes with everything you need to start growing.

It is easy to assemble and fun for the whole family to watch your food grow from seed to an abundant harvest ready to eat for dinner.

Tower Gardens fit easily on urban patios or rooftop gardens – practically anywhere!  

Grow almost any vegetable, herb, or flower

Requires as little as 5 percent of traditional growing nutrients & water

Produces crops in a fraction of the time it takes to grow in soil. Manufacturer details appear below:

____________________________________

The better way to eat healthy

You don’t need any gardening experience to use Tower Garden®. Its compact, state-of-the-art vertical aeroponic system fits easily on patios, rooftops, terraces, and—most of all—into a healthy diet.

It’s healthier

Tower Garden helps you eat more fruits and vegetables by letting you grow delicious vine-ripened produce right outside your back door. Grow almost anything you like, including tomatoes, lettuce, basil, peppers, spinach, beans, cucumbers, melons, and herbs. And increase your children’s interest in eating fresh fruits and vegetables by involving them in gardening.

It’s easier

Tower Garden is easy to assemble and maintain, and it can be placed in any relatively sunny place outside. There’s no soil, no weeds, and no ground pests to worry about. And you’ll have a full range of customer support to help ensure a successful growing experience, including our online Resource Center. 

It’s smarter

Because of its unique aeroponic technology and vertical design, Tower Garden uses less than 10% of the water and land required by traditional, soil-based agriculture.

A garden that’s healthier for you and the environment

Tower Garden® uses a unique vertical garden system that grows nutritious fruits and vegetables while being eco-friendly.

Grow greener

Because it utilizes aeroponics, Tower Garden’s closed-system technology recycles 100% of its nutrients and water. Plants therefore use less than 10% of both the water and the land that are commonly used in conventional and organic farming.*

Plus, the aeroponic growing system reduces the need for pesticides, insecticides, or herbicides. That’s because the all-natural earth minerals found in Tower Tonic® produce strong, healthy plants that can better protect themselves from plant pests and disease, and because the soil-less system is not subject to ground pests.

So Tower Garden allows you to decide whether to use any chemicals.

Put a farmer’s market on your back porch

Tower Garden® is a state-of-the-art vertical aeroponic growing system. It’s perfect for rooftops, patios, balconies, terraces—just about any relatively sunny place outside.

Using aeroponics and specially formulated Tower Tonic plant food, it grows almost any vegetable, herb, or flower—and many fruits—in less time than it takes in soil.*

Tower Garden gives you more control of your and your family’s health by making it easy to grow nutritious, great-tasting vegetables and fruits at home.

And it’s a smart choice, both environmentally and economically.

________________________________________________

If you are interested but unable to physically attend this time, click on the photo above for further details.  Group organizer plans to have a subsequent Meetup at her place later, so members can view hers operating first hand.

Group organizer can't be contacted via the Meetup site, since the address on file with Meetup is no longer operational.  It is necessary to type "MEETUP MEMBER" in her own contact form, which comes up if you click here: Contact Organizer.

                                     ******

 To better understand why our very survival depends upon personal preparedness steps we  take now, please view the following links:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eidQTDjQ5gw   (Crash Course - The Three E's)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nI-BIVWlc7A    (Resources & Monetary Systems)

http://www.krystalspiral.com/CamelotInterviews.htm (2012 Cosmic Energy Changes)

Details about each monthly topic will be added a month before the Meetup date. Please feel free to make suggestions for future topics. 

NOTE: Group organizer can't be contacted via the Meetup site, since the address on file with Meetup is no longer operational.  It is necessary to type "MEETUP MEMBER" in her own contact form, which comes up if you click here: Contact Organizer.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Meetup sign on one of the tables.

group.name: Back to Basics: Sustainable Self-Sufficient Healthy Living

item.name: Save Gardening Space with a Tower Garden
